amendment.description: To establish a program to use amounts collected from violations of the corporate average fuel economy program to expand the infrastructure necessary to increase the availability of alternative fuels.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4610 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 4610 proposed by Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S7384-7386; text: CR S7384-7385) To establish a program to use amounts collected from violations of the corporate average fuel economy program to expand the infrastructure necessary to increase the availability of alternative fuels.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4610 proposed by Senator Thune.
